title: Did 5.7 million illegal immigrants vote in the 2008 elections in the United States?
subtitle: A controversial study carried out in 2014 used survey data to show that 38 people may have voted as non-citizens in 2008, and Internet sites subsequently made a lot of extrapolation.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Reliable evidence indicates that 5.7 million illegal migrants voted in the 2008 elections.
